DOC.detailed_description: Title : Do ICU Structural Procedural Factors Influence Patient Related Outcomes : The Critical Illness Outcome Study ( CIOS ) Objectives : This exploratory ecologic study design examine organizational structural factor present adult intensive care unit United States . A second objective determine whether organizational structural factor associate patient related outcome . In addition , intend examine whether organizational structural issue associate patient treatment . Hypotheses : ( Ho ) A . The number protocol use ICU inversely associate ICU hospital survival critically ill patient . B . Compliance disease specific protocols independently associate hospital survival critically ill patient Specific Aims 1 . To describe organizational structure participate intensive care unit 2 . To determine whether number protocol use intensive care unit associate ICU hospital survival critically ill patient 3 . To determine frequency ICU 's follow disease specific protocols patient sepsis ALI Study Design 1 . Prospective ecologic study 50-60 adult intensive care unit admit patient 2 . ICU organizational structural data collect participate ICU 3 . 125-200 adult patient intensive care unit enrol . Patients within ICU varying , specific day week include . Demographic treatment variable collect day patient . Outcome data collect ICU hospital discharge .
